code: import*as authActionTypes from'../actions/authActionTypes';import{updateObject}from'../../shared/util';var initialState={token:'dummy',userId:null,error:null,loading:false,email:null};var authStart=function authStart(state,_action){return updateObject(state,{loading:true,error:null});};var authSuccess=function authSuccess(state,action){return updateObject(state,{loading:false,error:null,token:action.token,userId:action.userId,email:action.email});};var authFail=function authFail(state,action){return updateObject(state,{error:action.error,loading:false});};var authLogout=function authLogout(state,_action){return updateObject(state,{token:null,userId:null,email:null});};var authReducer=function authReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case authActionTypes.AUTH_START:return authStart(state,action);case authActionTypes.AUTH_SUCCESS:return authSuccess(state,action);case authActionTypes.AUTH_FAIL:return authFail(state,action);case authActionTypes.AUTH_LOGOUT:return authLogout(state,action);default:return state;}};export default authReducer;
